post:
Hello,<br>
We've got a brand new node in Phoenix, Arizona for KVM based VPSes.

**About us:**<br>
CrownCloud is an Australian based company which provides VPSes, shared hosting and dedicated server's since February 2012

**All VPSes include the following by default,**
4 Shared cores of E3-1270v2
100 Mbit/sec network
Guaranteed RAM and HDD
SolusVM control panel

**KVM-256**
256 MB RAM
2 GB HDD
500 GB Bandwidth
100 Mbit/sec network
Linux or Windows*

$18/year

**Order link:**
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=95


**KVM-1024**
1024 MB of RAM
10 GB HDD + 5 GB FREE (MENTION 5GBFREE in NOTES at checkout)
1 TB bandwidth
100 Mbit/sec network
Linux or Windows*

$5/month

**Order link:**
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=92


**KVM-512**
512 MB of RAM
20 GB HDD + 5 GB FREE (MENTION 5GBFREE in NOTES at checkout)
1 TB bandwidth
100 Mbit/sec network
Linux or Windows*

$5/month

**Order link:**
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=94


**KVM-2048**
2048 MB of RAM
30 GB HDD
3 TB bandwidth
100 Mbit/sec network
Linux or Windows*

$7/month

**Order link:**
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=96

Datacenter : Ubiquity<br>
IPv6 info : DC has it, we may get soon.<br>
Contact : PM me here and/or support ticket and/or support@crowncloud.net<br>
Looking for a custom plan ? : PM me here or email support@crowncloud.net <br>
TOS and AUP : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php/vps_tos <br>

***For Windows you'll have to provide your own license key and link to ISO.**
